Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Westbound Reroute near Belmont/Kenmore
ShortDescription: Update: WB 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheffield, Wellington, Racine and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kenmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheffield, Wellington, Racine and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kenmore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays at 54th/Cermak Affecting Loop-Bound Pink Line Service
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving 54th/Cermak. Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving 54th/Cermak. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Consider using the #21 Cermak buses as alternate service. 

Please allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays at Howard Affecting Red Line Service
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving Howard. Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving Howard. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Please allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Irving Park
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses temp. rerouted SB: Clark, South Port, Addison and Clark; NB: Clark, Addison, South Port and Clark, near Clark/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Clark/Irving Park, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via: Clark, South Port, Addison and Clark.

Northbound buses will operate via: Clark, Addison, South Port and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Garfield.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Garfield.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
